name: Banana Yetti
description:
Banana Yetti is an addictive and fast paced arcade game that will keep you on your toes.
The game features a cute and adorable yeti character that the player takes control of.
The goal of the game is to help the Yeti collect bananas and survive the harsh winter season.
jumping from one rock to another, overcoming various obstacles on your way.
The player must be careful not to fall off the rocks while collecting as many bananas as possible.

As you progress through the game, you will encounter increasingly difficult weather conditions.
Snowstorms and low temperatures will make it difficult for the Yeti to survive. The ultimate goal is to help the Yeti survive the winter and
collect as many bananas as possible before the end of the season. With each level, the obstacles become more difficult,
and weather conditions are more insidious.

Management in the game is simple and convenient. Players can use arrows or W, A, S, D to move
Yeti character on screen. The game has vibrant graphics and exciting sound effects that will keep
keep you on your toes for hours on end. So, get ready to go on an exciting adventure.
with the Banana Yeti and help the Yeti survive the winter by collecting as many bananas as possible.
